TITLE: Basic usage examples of waitUntil command
DESCRIPTION: Examples of how to use the waitUntil command for different waiting scenarios including cookies, global variables, and synchronous functions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/noriste/cypress-wait-until/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
// wait until a cookie is set
cy.waitUntil(() => cy.getCookie('token').then(cookie => Boolean(cookie && cookie.value)));

// wait until a global variable has an expected value
cy.waitUntil(() => cy.window().then(win => win.foo === "bar"));

// sync function works too!
cy.waitUntil(() => true);

// with all the available options
cy.waitUntil(() => cy.window().then(win => win.foo === "bar"), {
  errorMsg: 'This is a custom error message', // overrides the default error message
  timeout: 2000, // waits up to 2000 ms, default to 5000
  interval: 500 // performs the check every 500 ms, default to 200
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using waitUntil with assertions on the returned value
DESCRIPTION: Example of using waitUntil to wait for a condition and then asserting on the returned value, which becomes the subject for the next command.
SOURCE: https://github.com/noriste/cypress-wait-until/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
// wait until the Recaptcha token will be added to the dedicated hidden input field...
cy.waitUntil(() => cy.get("input[type=hidden]#recaptchatoken").then($el => $el.val()))
  // ... then, check that it's valid string asserting about it
  .then(token => expect(token).to.be.a("string").to.have.length.within(1, 1000));
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Chaining waitUntil with previous commands
DESCRIPTION: Examples showing how waitUntil can be chained with previous Cypress commands, with notes on the proper usage and limitations.
SOURCE: https://github.com/noriste/cypress-wait-until/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cy.waitUntil(() => cy.getCookie('token').then(cookie => cookie.value === '<EXPECTED_VALUE>'));
// is equivalent to
cy.wrap('<EXPECTED_VALUE>')
  .waitUntil((subject) => cy.getCookie('token').then(cookie => cookie.value === subject));
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Importing cypress-wait-until in Cypress support file
DESCRIPTION: Code to import the cypress-wait-until plugin in the Cypress support/commands.js file to extend Cypress commands.
SOURCE: https://github.com/noriste/cypress-wait-until/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
import 'cypress-wait-until';
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Non-retried commands example in waitUntil
DESCRIPTION: Example showing a pattern that won't work as expected since commands outside the checkFunction won't be retried.
SOURCE: https://github.com/noriste/cypress-wait-until/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
cy.getCookie('token') // will not be retried
  .waitUntil(cookie => cookie.value === '<EXPECTED_VALUE>');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing cypress-wait-until via npm or yarn
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the cypress-wait-until plugin as a development dependency using either npm or yarn package managers.
SOURCE: https://github.com/noriste/cypress-wait-until/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm i -D cypress-wait-until
# or
yarn add -D cypress-wait-until
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: TypeScript configuration for cypress-wait-until
DESCRIPTION: Configuration needed in the cypress/tsconfig.json file to use cypress-wait-until with TypeScript, ensuring proper type definitions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/noriste/cypress-wait-until/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "types": ["cypress", "cypress-wait-until"]
  }
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cypress.json configuration for TypeScript support file
DESCRIPTION: Configuration in cypress.json to specify the support file when using TypeScript to resolve 'cy.waitUntil is not a function' errors.
SOURCE: https://github.com/noriste/cypress-wait-until/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
{
  "supportFile": "cypress/support/commands.ts"
}
```
